availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis M. Holland (Caldwell County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Holland. Married to Sarah M. Harris Holland in Eddyville, Kentucky, in February 1857. Father of Mary Holland. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 371B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 50.
"An Act to change the name of William Johnston, and others," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort, KY: A. G. Hodges & Co., State Printer, 1849), 62.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #000321364, p. 211.
